entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE Warnings not reported with 9.0.101 #110673
  • Add CI support for testing APX #110672
    10.0.0
  • Return the matching search value in a multi-string search (i.e. IndexOfAny with SearchValues<string>) #110670
    Future
  • dotnet-sdk, version 9.0.101 fails with CMake 3.31.2 #110664
  • [mono] interpreter doesn't extend smaller integer values to register size upon return for arm64 #110649
  • interpreter causes crash when using GKMeshGraph #110644
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Tests failure on net10.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_Minijit_Debug #110643
  • JIT: Physical promotion enhancements #110642
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock Regressions on 12/6/2024 6:16:01 PM #110661
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- UtcAliases_MapToUtc #110640
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneInfoTests.UsingAlternativeTimeZoneIdsTest #110639
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneInfo_DisplayNameStartsWithOffset #110638
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneDisplayNames_Unix #110637
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- BinaryFormatter_RoundTrips #110636
  • Json source generation do not support custom JsonConverter on the key of a Dictionary #110634

Closed

  • Assertion Failure: ``assert (n < gc_heap::n_heaps)`` #106898
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Simpler, neater and more memorable contextual logging #110646
    Future
  • Blazor WASM applications crash on startup on iOS 16.4-16.6 when built with AOT & referencing certain dependencies #105912
    10.0.0
  • varargs and __arglist on different platforms #82081
    Future
  • ToFrozenDictionary() does not adopt the IEqualityComparer of the source dictionary. #110660
  • Blazorwasm : deployment with aot compilation and with out aot compilation #66287
    10.0.0
  • .NET 8 WebAssembly AOT not generating trampoline functions #97906
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Marshaling bool within struct with [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)] throws System.InvalidProgramException #107546
    10.0.0
  • MonoVM runtime size-reduction for WebAssembly #43778
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Custom compression pass for wasm #49222
    Future
  • [workloads] Add downlevel version check for workload versions #81310
    10.0.0
  • [PERF] Regressions in WASM AOT x64 in Logging.Formatting and IndexOf #92163
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT does not use locally built ILLink.Tasks #93789
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] `LowLevelPerf.GenericGenericMethod` failing #91742
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] broad regressions in vector performance under interpreter #99554
    10.0.0
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 21 Nov 2022 #79599
    10.0.0
  • [SIMD] Blazor Web App will not load webassembly component on virtualized machines with Chromium browser #103072
    10.0.0
  • fgReplacePred will attempt to remove Preds that do not exist. #8732
    Future
  • Document wasm relinking functionality #48349
    Future
  • RyuJIT: Add unreachable code removal pass #7974
    Future
  • Blazor WASM applications on net8.0 freeze on startup on iOS 18 RC (22A3354) when built with AOT #105893
    10.0.0
  • Implement forward substitution utility to create larger trees for morph #6973
    Future
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
    10.0.0
  • Mono runtime unable to set callspec and utilize them #110601
    10.0.0
  • Add support for specifying DOTNET_DiagnosticPortDefaultPrefix #110473
    10.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][Linux][Inliner] In-lining heuristic needs to be tuned for Linux ABI #5615
    Future
  • localloc tests fail with InvalidProgramException #4855
    Future
  • Performance oddity: Vector3 * Matrix3 slower than Vector4 * Matrix4 #4543
    Future
  • System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests timeouts #110285
    10.0.0
  • RyuJIT call optimization and aggressive inlining with known generic types #4489
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete .GuardCF library build #110671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add bench output log, to the file and to the console #110669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve codegen for ExtractMostSignificatBits #110662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid remorphing general `gtFoldExpr` return #110658
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Repair profile after tail-merging #110656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK to v25.0 #110654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110652
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110651
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • [browser] Speed up `WasmBuildTests` by using the compression switch #110645
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #110632
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Correct arm64 SignExtension #110635
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Always re-read global pointers in `GetUsefulGlobals` #110633
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix reporting of tier name metadata #110610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow - reapply #110606
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate example diffs in diffs summary #110619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix Mono profiler EventPipe provider instrumentation feature. #110618
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [Mono]: Update Mono diagnostic docs. #110621
    area-Tracing-mono
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • release/9.0-staging -- Update Alpine, Debian, and Fedora versions #110493
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • release/8.0-staging -- Update Alpine and Fedora versions #110492
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.x
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm] Workaround incorrect mono restore when building WBT #110590
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Fix emitInsMayWriteToGCReg #110390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Alpine, Debian, and Ubuntu versions #110476
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110629
    Servicing-consider, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix assertion due to remorph #110516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove always-true `fgCanRelocateEHRegions` #110612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] NativeAOT-LLVM support in browser-bench #110611
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Support sign mismatches for small types in physical promotion #104953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-IL method descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetMethodClassificationDataType` #110602
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2600106 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added a Dynamic Event for OOM Reporting #110617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Push initial defs and create initial def VNs for all tracked locals #105921
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110628
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110626
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Add a Swift runtime exception #2876
  • [SwiftBindings] In TypeMetadata handle ExistentialContainers #2875
  • [SwiftBindings] Handle TypeMetadata for closures #2874
  • [SwiftBindings] Hande TypeMetadata for tuples #2873

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Added accessors for TypeMetadata #2877

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
    area-async
  • [SwiftBindings] Add support for non-frozen structs #2870
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Improve testing framework #2871
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing net9.0 SDK on AWS Linux 2023 breaks net8.0 SDK and runtime #45440
  • Clear Communication regarding Servicing Releases #45426
  • Deprecate :: in favor of @ in dotnet new install command #45422

Closed

  • Installing MAUI workload on M1 MacBook Pro gets stuck. #45023
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.100.1'.." displays after installing the workload set from global.json. #45424
  • Tests failed in CI: restore failed with Response status code does not indicate success: 409 (Public access is not permitted on this storage account #45417
  • The Visual Studio version on the .NET 10.0 SDK installer page is incorrect #45032

PullRequests

Created

  • (Draft) Remove `SlnFile` #45442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable ASP.NET Core installers on Linux in the VMR #45437
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add support for .NET 9.0 web project templates #45423
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Make sure that sdk manifest has RepoOrigin attribute #45444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the LLVMJIT jobs from the VMR #45443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Workaround for MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44928
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.2
  • Add `testfx` to VMR's source mappings #45429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory now that we run with native contai… #45428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WASM] Clean up of `HybridGlobalization` in tests #45412
    Area-Infrastructure, arch-wasm, untriaged, 10.0.1xx
  • Fix manifest artifacts reading #45407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use library-packs also when RestoreAdditionalProjectSources is explicitly set. #44863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add netcoreapp9.1 tfm to It_fails_to_build_if_targeting_a_higher_framework_than_is_supported test #45409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • allow reading all mcr image names #44738
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints) #8879
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Pattern-based with-expressions #8877
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Deconstruction in from and let #8875
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: &&= and ||= assignment operators #8873
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: base(T) phase two #8871
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #8865
    Working Set

Closed

  • Champion "Nullable-enhanced common type" #33
    Likely Never
  • Champion "Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints)" #110
    Working Set
  • Champion "pattern-based `with` expressions" #162
    Backlog
  • Champion "deconstruction in from and let" #189
    Any Time
  • Champion "return, break and continue expressions" #867
    Likely Never
  • Champion: "&&= and ||= assignment operators" #1718
    Likely Never
  • Open LDM Issues for Nullable Reference Types #2201
    8.0
  • Champion: `base(T)` phase two #2337
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Direct constructor parameters #4024
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Directly invoked anonymous functions #8869
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #8867
    Backlog
  • Top-level statements and functions #3117
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Directly invoked anonymous functions #4748
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Better conversion: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> #8779
  • Dictionary expressions: update key-value pair conversions #8850

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig is ignored during "Change namespace to match folder structure" #76409
  • Unexpected error "feature 'ref struct interfaces' is not available" #76401
  • Argument contains duplicate analyzer instances. (Parameter 'analyzers') #76398
  • Area - Simplify LINQ Expression #76397
  • No ability to disable fading for unused private methods analyzer #76396
  • NullReferenceException when invoking the compiler (building roslyn inside the VMR) #76394
  • Interpolated string handler: inconsistent use of AppendFormatted when appending constants #76391
  • Roslyn crashes when reporting an error with an "unusual" compilation unit name #76390

Closed

  • IDE0038 ignores scopes of variables with same (re-defined) name, ignores static lambdas, and produces invalid code #68051
    Backlog
  • IDE0019 suggests pattern matching but the generated pattern matching changes the meaning of the code #39600
    Backlog
  • Not offered to "Extract Method" when resulting async method produces two values #64597
    18.0
  • Extracting method after confirmations does nothing #67647
    Backlog
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • Area - IDE #76188
  • Interceptors should not internally identify calls using paths #76341
    17.13
  • CS8762 issues: unnecessarily pops up in a NotNullWhen+MaybeNullWhen combination and in some cases doesn't pop up at all #76140
    17.13
  • Const identifier not bound #76403
  • `UnscopedRef` should not affect code under the old ref safety rules #75828
    17.13
  • `SyntaxFacts`' method can make assumptions aboun nonexistent syntax kinds #72301
  • Extract method refactoring is not offered in the base class argument #67017
    18.0
  • Codefix `Add parameters to Ctor()` fails to add property assignment for primary constructor #71428
    18.0
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35611.165 #76389
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35611.202 #76388

PullRequests

Created

  • Update LOC branch to 17.13 #76408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue with 'use pattern matching' where it would cause a variable to not be considered assigned #76407
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/76384 to main #76405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Rename 'scopeOfTheContainingExpression' to 'localScopeDepth' #76400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize ProductDependencyGraph.DoesProjectTransitivelyDependOnProject #76399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • ResultProvider: Consume DkmClrModuleInstance.GetMetaDataImportHolder #76395
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Small reduction in allocations in DateAndTimeLanguageDetector #76393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make extracted parameters non-nullable when possible. #76386
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report inappropriate OverloadResolutionPriority attribute applications #76385
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority

Merged

  • Razor synchronize loader #76357
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use pattern matching' innapropriately capturing variables across a lambda #76406
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not offer 'use pattern matching' when it would change semantics #76404
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix extract method in top level #76402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue where structure tag could get stuck at the wrong location #76194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Internally identify interceptions by content hash #76344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Interceptors, Next
  • Support returning tuples in extract method when ref/out are not possible. #76383
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to VBOverloadResolutionPriority #76392
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add support for extract method in the PrimaryConstructor base list #76371
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update 'add parameter' to assign to field/property when adding a parameter to a primary constructor. #76360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations from doing repeated adds into an ImmutableDictionary in SolutionCompilationState.ComputeFrozenSnapshot #76361
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement editorconfig serializer for naming style preferences (17.12) #76376
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in WithUsingNamespacesAndTypesBinder.GetForwardedToAssemblyInUsingNamespaces #76370
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Share more code in extract method #76382
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Interceptors
  • Cache the compilation states in compilation order to avoid recalculation #76380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix TFM inconsistency in BuildHost #76354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Do honor abstract required during state initialization in nullable #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields, 17.13
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • [WIP] Change PR Val builds to be test signed #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add flexibility for versioned secrets to KeyPerFileConfigurationProvider/Source #59464
  • OIDC - Validation failure during PAR does not trigger OnAuthenticationFailed() event #59462
  • DataProtectionProvider fails to unprotect when hosted on IIS with keys persisted to the default location #59461
  • What is the right way to do GDPR cookie consent in Blazor Server? #59457
  • [Blazor] Getting rid of Blazor.boot.json and using a different strategy to flow the environment. #59456
    .NET 10 Planning

Created

Updated

    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Add IsEmptyOrAtEnd method to StringSegment #59242
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Added simplified null checking. #59331
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Replace ANY ip to root as url when generating OpenAPI's servers prope… #59314
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59349

entry.content:
Issues

Created

    Backlog

Closed
